name: BAD ALCHEMY
description:
Originally made for the MiniJam #41, over 72 hours.

Controls / hold shift to grab and release objects, use WASD to move and jump.

Instructions / fuse elements to discover combinations and try to deliver the desired object.

On a side note, the actual combinations make next to no sense. Have fun!

Known Issues-glitches / 

  • the game crashes after certain object limit
  • combinations may not work 100% of the time
  • you can escape the game, I wouldn't recommend doing so, though.

VER 1.001 - last fix before the jam, changed the object limit so that it doesn't crash as much. Pretty much a workaround, will get to real updates when the jam ends.

Asset Credits / 

Music, Font - royalty free assets

Art, code - completely original from scratch

SFX - made using SFXR
